text.title: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing

head.s: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing

p.s: Do you want to look at a website but do n't want your parents to know ?

item.s: Find a website your parents will allow you to use .
Visit that website and keep the page open .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 1 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Find the website you want to use and open it up in a new window or tab .
Make sure to watch and listen for parents or anybody else that may tell on you .
If someone comes , quickly switch windows or tabs to the other website .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: In Windows , you can quickly close the tab or window by pressing + .
In Linux , you can switch workspaces quickly using the mouse wheel .

Open your System Settings and click on
Windows Manager Tweaks
.

Then select
Workspaces
tab and check the
Use the mouse wheel on the desktop to switch workspaces
.
Clear your history .
When you 're finished , delete all the history on your computer that leads to any websites your parents do n't want you on .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 3 Version 3.jpg

list.item:
In Firefox , there is actually an option you can select which will automatically clear your browsing history when you exit the browser .
This article
will guide you in setting that up .

item.s: Using incognito mode !
This is a special window in the browser which , when used , does not record any internet data , history , or cache .
Most popular browser have such an option .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 4 Version 3.jpg

item.s: In Internet Explorer , you can press ++ to enter Private browsing .
To exit incognito mode , simply close the window with incognito enabled .
In Firefox , you can press ++ .
To exit this window in Firefox , press the same buttons .
In Google Chrome , you can press ++ to enter Incognito Mode .
To exit incognito mode , simply close the window with incognito enabled .

list.item: Download another internet browser such as Firefox or Safari .

item.s: Do not make this browser your default browser .

When you install it make sure to
not
set as your default browser .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 6 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Clear all evidence of the installation .
If you are using Windows , delete the quick launch shortcut and move it to some safe location .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 7 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Use this browser to surf the internet privately .
Now , you can use the other browser for stuff you do n't want your parents to know about .
The favourites , history , cache , and cookies will be separate from your normal browser .
Your parents will continue to use the other browser normally , and even if they check the history they wo n't find anything , but make sure they do n't notice the other browser .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 8 Version 2.jpg

list.item:
Select a device to host your portable applications .
Any cell phone , MP3 player , camera , USB flash drive , or portable hard drive which comes up as a
removable device
in Windows will work .

item.s: Download the Portable Firefox .
You can search it on Google .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 10 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Install their launcher menu and then portable Firefox on your device .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 11 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Restart your device .
You can do this by unplugging your device and plunging it back in , or you can turn it off , then turn it back on .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 12 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Unblock Windows Firewall .

Windows will ask you what you want to do ; let it start
PortableAppz.blogspot.com
; this will open the menu .
Red , looks like the Start menu , comes up on the right .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 13 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click the Firefox icon/name on the menu .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 14 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Portable Firefox will keep all of your bookmarks , history , and settings on your device ; it wo n't leave anything behind on the host computer .
You can take it to a friend 's house , hook it up , and all of your stuff is there .
4GB and 8GB flash drives can be bought for very cheap now online and in some stores .
Corsair drives tend to have the fastest speeds .
Be sure to exit the menu ( grey circle with white arrow ) when you 're done using it .

figure.rend: Browse Internet Websites Without Your Parents Knowing Step 15 Version 2.jpg

p.s: For a VPN is the newer way to hide data online , the Incognito tab , cannot hide data from your router , but a VPN such as Tor can .
They are also connected to the dark web sites , so are made to be anonymous .

item.s: It 's best to be alone when searching something you do n't want your parents seeing .
Use your instinct - it 's better to be safe than sorry when it comes to things like this .
On Internet Explorer , delete your history by clicking tools , then click " delete browsing history " and click delete all .
On Firefox , click tools , then click " clear private data " and click " clear private data " now .
A Windows 7 is the best computer for this because the internet tabs do not show a preview of the description of websites .
If there is one in your house , use it .

If you 're technically minded , then you can use a proxy website which will retrieve the packet data from another server , not your internet service provider , this will hide it from any parent controls installed on the router or family safety program .
You could also use a Free VPN service which will divert all internet logs to another server .
Do n't use Google , use DuckDuckGo instead , because Google keeps a log of what you searched for that you ca n't erase , but DuckDuckGo does not .
If your parents find out , you may lose computer privileges or have parental controls turned on and block the sites they do n't want you on .
Your parents do everything for your own good .
It is better to obey them and not to disobey .
They are much more experienced and probably wo n't allow anything which could harm their children .
